Chris Minotti has been a faithful SJN supporter.  She’s enabled us to consistenly offer our programs despite the ebb and flow of volunteers who leave when they are hired—which is, of course, our objective!   She has supported me directly with coordination of events, maintenance of our website and securing volunteers for our regular and special programs.  Chris has helped on special projects, functioning as a lead or team member/SME participant; she has also served as a personal assistant as needed.Cheerful and generous, Chris has directed volunteers, supported board members and helped members who approached her with willingness and enthusiasm.I’m very grateful for the involvement and support Chris Minotti has given me and SJN and wish her well in future endeavors.

I hired Chris as a "social networking/computing guru" when I launched my consulting company Winnerviewer LLC in mid- 2009. She helped me organize my data bases, connect with and utilize LinkedIn and set a technical plan of action in motion early on following the inception of my company. She is knowledgable, personable, supportive, creative and results driven. She kept my business plan and my company mission in mind and built my data around my goals. Chris also challenged me to create business opportunities I had not considered while keeping the needs of the client paramount. She has become a great friend as well as respected business professional and partner. A huge part of the success of my company is directly attributable to Chris. Hire Chris if you want results...

summary: During my career I have successfully managed multiple departments such as Accounting, Human Recourses and Technologies, managed large and small projects simultaneously, assisted Fortune 500 to Small Business customers to improve processes and implement cost saving programs, maximizing cost savings potential.  Additionally, I have extensive experience in travel, vendor management, business development and marketing.My goal is to secure a key position, with responsibility to maximize customer satisfaction, profitability and productivity through my strengths, which include planning, system/process improvement and development, staffing strategies for recruitment, training, and legal compliance, as well as through the utilization of modern best-practices. Your benefit is to gain a dedicated, customer driven and independent team member who will get the job done right the first time.SEO:  Re-engineering, organizational design, training, coaching, resolution, results, goals, quality assurance, process improvement, change management, OD, organizational development, customer service, vendor management, strategic planning, project management, budgeting, compensation analysis, microsoft office, business services, payroll processing, cash management, quickBooks, recruitmentSpecialties: || Project Management|| Organizational Strategy|| Strategic Planning|| Compensation Analysis|| Business Process Re-engineerin|| Office Management|| Staff Recruitment, Evaluation, Training, Scheduling, and Coaching || Conflict/Problem Intervention and Resolution|| Service-Based Customer Service|| Vendor/Supplier Relations and Coordination|| Microsoft Office Specialist Certification || Proficient with Highly Complex Office Computer Systems and Programs
